p: Essential oil extraction. Fresh leaves of C. squalida (526 g), C. sessiliflora (486 g), Ma. guianensis (576 g), My. guianensis (483 g), S. guianensis (487 g), O. minarum (500 g) and E. paniculata (424 g) were separately subjected to hydrodistillation in a Clevengerâˆ’type apparatus for 8 h, to yield 280 mg (0.05% w/ w), 916 mg (0.19% w/ w), 1.2 g (0.2% w/ w), 76 mg (0.015% w/ w), 2.6 g (0.5% w/ w), 690 mg (0.14% w/ w) and 544 mg (0.13% w/ w) of essential oils, respectively.
